DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose perform double-blind , randomize placebo-controlled trial examine hypothesis soy protein isoflavones could improve glycemic control , insulin sensitivity decrease cardiovascular risk factor postmenopausal woman prediabetes .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Soy Protein Isoflavones Glycemic Control , Insulin Sensitivity Cardiovascular Risk Factors
DOC.criteria: Hong Kong Chinese menopausal woman age 4670 year prediabetes early untreated diabetes Women breast , ovary cancer recent 5year Severe renal liver dysfunction Women androgen excess Smokers Current use recent ( 3month ) use drug treatment glycemic control , lipid improvement , weight reduction ; Subjects know soy milk allergy .
